markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winged Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=472)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 617 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made from soft leather, with delicate white wings attached to the heel, these boots are ensorcelled with powerful air magic. Whenever you fall while wearing these boots, the boots automatically cast [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) on you. This benefit can’t trigger again for 10 minutes.

<document level="2" id="action-284" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Winged Boots
